title: Reye syndrome
summary: Reye syndrome is a rapidly worsening brain disease.[2] Symptoms may include vomiting, personality changes, confusion, seizures, and loss of consciousness.[1] While liver toxicity typically occurs, jaundice usually does not.[2] Death occurs in 20â€“40% of those affected and about a third of those who survive are left with a significant degree of brain damage.[2][3]
